hero.description: I'm a front-end software engineer, specialized in crafting high-quality solutions. I work with React, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and tools like Next.js, Tailwind, and Git. I always strive to deliver performance, accessibility, and a great user experience.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Check out my professional journey and the skills I've developed along the way.

list.shortDescription: I collaborate with front-end developers in creating and maintaining web applications, using modern technologies like React, Next, Material UI, Styled Components, Redux, and TypeScript, converting Figma prototypes into clean and responsive code, which increased end-user productivity.
